snippet: Growing anxiety about the economy and concern about Europe pushed up bond prices, and the yield on the Treasury’s 10-year note matched its record low.
abstract: Stocks fall modestly after a surprising decline in June retail sales provides the latest worrying sign about the economy.
lead_paragraph: Growing anxiety about the economy and concern about Europe pushed up bond prices, and the yield on the Treasury’s 10-year note matched its record low.

headline.seo: Shares Slip on Surprising Fall in Retail Sales
headline.main: Shares Slip on Decline in Retail Sales
headline.print_headline: Shares Slip On Decline In Retail Sales
